ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:54:30 [Issue ID 4000-133150] urn:comicvine:4000-133150 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:06:22. [Issue ID 251254]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Three hot new witches-so new that some of them haven't figured out that they are witches-become mysteriously united.
In this issue, we meet the cast that will become the Trinity. Elsa Grimston, a child of a magician of old and the moon his seed and magic was spilled upon. Sook, a Korean girl with a belief that nothing bad ever happens to her. Kara, the girlfriend of a rockstar who denies the existence of magic. But beyond all of that is some backstory, explaining who Elsa is, and what she is doing. But it seems someone is standing in her way, someone she cannot touch...Lucifer.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/the-witching-1-fly-me-to-the-moon/4000-133150/

ComicInfo.Title: Fly Me To The Moon
